heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy, with breaks of sun developing in southern valleys.  Localized snow showers in the north and mountains.  Highs in the mid 20s to mid 30s, warmest in southern valleys.  Winds light, becoming northwest near 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy, with snow showers lingering north, mainly over the higher terrain, a dusting to 2 inches.  Lows in the teens, near 10 over the higher terrain north.  Winds northwest near 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.

heading: Thursday
text: Morning clouds giving way to increasing periods of sun, last in the northern mountains.  A bit colder.  Highs in the 20s, from 20 to 30 north to south.  Winds northwest near 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.
